# Welcome to a new Fresh Network,  

We are here with some new budget VPS offers.   
In a premium location. All plans come with a SolusVM Control Panel.

FreshNetworks started in 2015,to provide top and quality vps services.  
Our services are housed on our fantastic and fast infrastructure, connected to an 1Gbit connection, giving your VPS the boost it needs to perform in the online world.  


## **Nano**  
* 512MB RAM  
* 25GB HDD
* 500GB Bandwidth
* 1 IPv4  
* DDoS protected
* _**€3.50/month ($4/month)**_  
*  [Order in Montreal, Canada](http://freshnetworks.co/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=12)  

## **Standard**  
* 1GB RAM  
* 35GB HDD
* 1TB Bandwidth
* 1 IPv4  
* DDoS protected
* _**€4.50/month ($5.15/month)**_  
*  [Order in Montreal, Canada](http://freshnetworks.co/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=13)  

## **Mega**  
* 2GB RAM  
* 50GB HDD
* 2TB Bandwidth
* 1 IPv4  
* DDoS protected
* _**€6.15/month ($7/month)**_  
*  [Order in Montreal, Canada](http://freshnetworks.co/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=14)  

All VPSes are manual deployment within 24hours.

## All VPSes get 25% off Shared Hosting plans with the coupon <pre>AC3UE0WVJ9</pre>

Any questions reply, PM or send a ticket :)
